thread.title: GeoComply Launches "Solus" - Total Geolocation Solution for the Daily Fantasy Sports Industry
thread.title_full: GeoComply Launches "Solus" - Total Geolocation Solution for the Daily Fantasy Sports Industry - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: GeoComply Launches "Solus" - Total Geolocation Solution for the Daily Fantasy Sports Industry
text:
GeoComply
DraftDay Gaming Group is the first Daily Fantasy Sports Operator to Use the New Solus Solution
LAS VEGAS , Oct. 22, GeoComply USA , Inc. today announces the launch of "Solus," its new suite of services for the daily fantasy sports industry. Specially designed for the needs of this rapidly evolving sector, Solus provides cutting edge geolocation and anti-fraud solutions tailored for the particular operational and market needs of daily fantasy sports.
"DFS is one of the fastest growing sectors in the United States today, and with DraftDay, we are really excited to work with one of the most innovative operators in that space," said Anna Sainsbury , CEO of GeoComply USA . "We have designed Solus to fit the specific characteristics of the daily fantasy sports market, where ease of UX and speed of transaction is key, while ensuring that the increased need for geolocation services within the DFS industry are met."
"DraftDay Gaming Group is committed to being the safest and most secure DFS operator in the industry. By teaming up with GeoComply, the market-leader in geolocation services, we are providing our players with the highest level of consumer confidence with a unique user-friendly, B2B platform required to meet the demands of a rapidly changing environment," said Rich Roberts CEO of DraftDay.
For more information contact:
GeoComply USA , Inc.
Anna Sainsbury , Chief Executive Officer
anna@geocomply.com
About GeoComply USA , Inc.
GeoComply are the market-leader for "compliance grade" geolocation, counting the market leaders for online broadcasting, payments and gaming across North America , Europe and Asia as their customers. Deployed across well over 200 million devices GeoComply gaming division has a near 100% market share in the US and is licensed as a geolocation service provider by Nevada Gaming Control Board, New Jersey's Division of Gaming Enforcement and the Commonwealth of Delaware . GeoComply was recognized as Geolocation service provider of the year 2015 by iGaming Business and eGaming Review. For more information please visit www.geocomply.com
About DraftDay Gaming Group, Inc.
DraftDay Gaming Group, Inc. is the market leading business-to-business daily fantasy sports platform provider. Born out of a partnership between Viggle Inc. and Sportech Digital, a subsidiary of Sportech PLC, DraftDay Gaming Group, Inc. provides turnkey, white-label daily fantasy sports solutions to organizations looking for ways to monetize their existing users while protecting their valuable databases. The DraftDay network has paid out over $30 million in prizes with player retention and brand loyalty second to none in the industry. For more information please visit www.draftdaygaming.com
Contact Information:
Jodie Thind
Director
Lyceum Media
07932440157
jodie@lyceummedia.com
